pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Variable Selection Methods for Multivariate Data // Bayesian variable selection methods for data with multivariate responses and multiple covariates. The package contains implementations of multivariate Bayesian variable selection methods for continuous data (Lee et al., Biometrics, 2017 doi: 10.1111/biom.12557) and zero-inflated count data (Lee et al., Biostatistics, 2020 doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxy067).
